bug.author: mnunberg
bug.description: When doing MODELRUN, queuePush leaks.. (I'm going off my memory here..)

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mnunberg>@mnunberg</denchmark-link> I've committed changes that should have solved a few leaks. It would be great if we could make another pass of Valgrind
We have been monitoring running instances and leaks seem to be gone. Closing for now, feel free to reopen.
